CLICK TO EDIT

Editing content in our composer is fairly easy. Just click on the content you want to alter and it will load the edit window for your selected content.

[ceimage class="live-image" style="margin-left: -32px;" id="14" alt="layer_1_img" lightbox="no"][/ceimage]
[ceimage class="live-image" id="47" alt="layer_2_icon" lightbox="no"][/ceimage]

CONTENT MODULES

Since the editor is very flexible and extendable via custom modules, we focused on the main content types you need to create your project.

[ceimage class="live-image" style="margin-left: -0px;" id="48" alt="layer_2_img" lightbox="no"][/ceimage]
[ceimage class="live-image" id="49" alt="layer_3_icon" lightbox="no"][/ceimage]

CUSTOM FONTSETS

Ever dreamed of working with your favorite webfonts in a content editor? We made it possible, supporting all available font services.

[ceimage class="live-image" style="margin-left: -32px;" id="50" alt="layer_3_img" lightbox="no"][/ceimage]

SOME SUPPORTED SITES

[ceimage class="live-image" id="51" alt="layer_3_img_2" lightbox="no"][/ceimage]
[ceimage class="live-image" id="52" alt="layer_4_icon" lightbox="no"][/ceimage]

CONTENT LAYERS

Each content layer you add consists of a full width container you can fully customize. This way you have thousands of option to layout your page.

[ceimage class="live-image" style="margin-left: -0px;" id="53" alt="layer_4_img" lightbox="no"][/ceimage]
[ceimage class="live-image" id="54" alt="layer_5_icon" lightbox="no"][/ceimage]

RE-ORDER

To keep everything organized you can define a name for every layer and re-order them as you like. In the grid you always see which layer is active.

[ceimage class="live-image" style="margin-left: -19.5px;" id="55" alt="layer_5_img" lightbox="no"][/ceimage]
[ceimage class="live-image" id="33" alt="footer_layer" lightbox="no"][/ceimage]
